#### Solution

```{r, echo=FALSE}
tab = tidy(res)
SSs = tab[,3]
dfs = tab[,2]
MSs = tab[,4]
Fs = tab[,5]
```

For factor A:

\[
\begin{eqnarray}
MS_A &=& \frac{SS_A}{df_A}\\
&=&\frac{`r SSs[1]`}{`r dfs[1]`}\\
&=&`r round(SSs[1]/dfs[1],3)`
\end{eqnarray}
\]

\[
\begin{eqnarray}
F_A &=& \frac{MS_A}{MS_{error}}\\
&=&\frac{`r MSs[1]`}{`r MSs[4]`}\\
&=&`r round(MSs[1]/MSs[4],3)`
\end{eqnarray}
\]


<p>

For factor B:

\[
\begin{eqnarray}
MS_A &=& \frac{SS_B}{df_B}\\
&=&\frac{`r SSs[2]`}{`r dfs[2]`}\\
&=&`r round(SSs[2]/dfs[2],3)`
\end{eqnarray}
\]

\[
\begin{eqnarray}
F_B &=& \frac{MS_B}{MS_{error}}\\
&=&\frac{`r MSs[2]`}{`r MSs[4]`}\\
&=&`r round(MSs[2]/MSs[4],3)`
\end{eqnarray}
\]
